pageContext.claim: “It's a question of common sense. So we have a G-7. He's not there. Half of the meeting is devoted to Russia, and if he was there, it'd be much easier to solve.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump has said Russia should be invited back into the G-7 (formerly the G-8, until Russia invaded Crimea and was expelled), but what he omits from these remarks is that Russia's interests and provocations often target the other G-7 nations. For example, Russia's cyber espionage campaign to interfere in the 2016 U.S. presidential election in Trump's favor.
